It has been particularly acclaimed for exploring stories beyond the traditional bible, skillful direction, high production value, and cast performances. author: Shazmeen Navrange
excerpt: Are you curious to know why there's no The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9 release date and time? Then, here are the details.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Viewers are wondering whether there’s a The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9 release date and time. Throughout its five seasons, the series has received strong ratings, positive reception, and impressive viewership. It has been particularly acclaimed for exploring stories beyond the traditional bible, skillful direction, high production value, and cast performances. Accordingly, many want to know if additional episodes or installments could be expected. Here’s all you need to know. The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9 release date and time explained There is no release date and time for The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9. This is because the series concluded with Episode 8 titled “The Upper Room (2).” The Chosen is a Christian historical drama series that centers around Jesus, the son of a carpenter, and his compassion for humanity. Through the eyes of his disciples, it offers a closer and authentic look at Jesus’ life and important teachings. Has The Chosen Season 5 ended? Yes,The Chosen Season 5 has finished. The show concluded on June 29, 2025. Viewers need not have to worry as The Chosen has already been renewed for Seasons 6 and 7. The next season will focus on the crucifixion of Jesus. Moreover, its finale will premiere in theaters on March 12, 2027. Where to watch previous The Chosen Season 5 episodes You can watch The Chosen Season 5 via Amazon Prime Video. Amazon Prime Video is an OTT streaming service that offers original movies and shows, including Citadel, The Boys, Reacher, House of David, and many more. Furthermore, new users can benefit from its one-month free trial. However, others would be required to purchase a valid plan. Its subscription starts at $14.99 per month or $139 per year. The series’ synopsis reads: “The life of Christ through the eyes of those who encountered him called The Chosen.”
html:
Viewers are wondering whether there’s a The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9 release date and time. Throughout its five seasons, the series has received strong ratings, positive reception, and impressive viewership. It has been particularly acclaimed for exploring stories beyond the traditional bible, skillful direction, high production value, and cast performances. Accordingly, many want to know if additional episodes or installments could be expected.

Here’s all you need to know.

The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9 release date and time explained

There is no release date and time for The Chosen Season 5 Episode 9. This is because the series concluded with Episode 8 titled “The Upper Room (2).”

The Chosen is a Christian historical drama series that centers around Jesus, the son of a carpenter, and his compassion for humanity. Through the eyes of his disciples, it offers a closer and authentic look at Jesus’ life and important teachings.

Has The Chosen Season 5 ended?

Yes,The Chosen Season 5 has finished. The show concluded on June 29, 2025.

Viewers need not have to worry as The Chosen has already been renewed for Seasons 6 and 7. The next season will focus on the crucifixion of Jesus. Moreover, its finale will premiere in theaters on March 12, 2027.

Where to watch previous The Chosen Season 5 episodes

You can watch The Chosen Season 5 via Amazon Prime Video.

Amazon Prime Video is an OTT streaming service that offers original movies and shows, including Citadel, The Boys, Reacher, House of David, and many more. Furthermore, new users can benefit from its one-month free trial. However, others would be required to purchase a valid plan. Its subscription starts at $14.99 per month or $139 per year.

The series’ synopsis reads:

“The life of Christ through the eyes of those who encountered him called The Chosen.”
